betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§4§lBe sure to properly read this quest to not get lost during your playthrough.§r


Informative Quests such as this will appear in both the chapter it is unlocked, and the Information chapter. Regularly come back to the §9"Tips and Tricks" Tab§r if you feel like you forgot something.


Quest outlines are merely the main goals. §6Every single Quest is extremely important or provides crucial Information§r. §cIf something is optional, it will be stated§r.


Modpack can be played on §dPeaceful§r, and we recommend you to do so. You may also use the keepInventory Gamerule and abuse minimap teleport as you see fit. This modpack is not focusing on survival.


Make good use of §2JEI§r. Items have several recipes, so do not stop at the first displayed. Identify patterns in autogenerated recipes (example: all the Iron related items macerating into Iron Dusts). When complex recipes arise, we will make sure to §6guide you§r through the best path to a product.
